name: Events In City
author: Allevents.in

sections.description:
Official plugin of the largest event discovery platform “All Events in City”.

All Events in City Plugin has two widgets, display events by city and events by an event organizer.

1) Events in City – Engage your visitors by displaying the best events from All Events in City right into your site. You can select the height and width below. If your site is of specialized nature, you can also select the category. It is as easy as it can get.

You can display events by category like Sports, Music, Concerts, Parties, Theatre, Performance, Art, Exhibitions, Business, Workshops, Festivals, Meetups events.

Now onwords you can embed your events onto your website using simple shortcode.

2) Events by Organizer – Plugin lets you show your upcoming events.You can select the height and width below.It is as easy as it can get… and free!

Also Organizer can display their upcoming and past events by adjusting height and width.

Allevents.in has the largest pool of events. Covers 30 million events from 30,000 cities worldwide.

Shortcodes

1) Events in City

[city-events city=’New York’]

[city-events city=’New York’ category=’All’ width=’500′ height=’500′ header=’1′]

2) Events by Organizer

[org-events organizer_id=’198763′]

[org-events organizer_id=’198763′ width=’100%’ height=’500′]

The plugin allows you to select city and category of events. You can adjust/set height and width of the box from widget section.

Website: http://allevents.in/

Note* : For other frameworks or custom websites, you can download the iframe plugin from All Events in City | Organizer Plugin
sections.installation:
1. Unpack events-in-city.zip and upload its content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugins called ‘All Events In City’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can see ‘Events In City’ and ‘Events by Organizer’ widgets in appearance -> widgets -> Events In City/Events by Organizer.
  4. Drag and drop the widget, wherever you want to display events.
  5. You can also generate shortcode to display events from “All Events in City” menu from admin sidebar.
sections.changelog:
v 3.0 – 12/1/2018

  • New Layout for wider screen
  • Fully customizable control panel
  • Auto resizable and Responsive Event block
  • Full page Event Listing
  • Sell Ticket directly from your website
  • UPDATE NOTE: We have merged all plugins into one plugin. So if you are updating from the old version, you may see a notice that “plugin has been deactivated”, kindly ignore it, your old plugin will work as it is.

v 2.0 – 19/2/2016

  • You can embed your events into your website using [embed-events] shortcode
  • Organizer Plugin lets you show his/her upcoming and past events
  • Shortcode [org-events] to display organizer`s upcoming and past events on post and pages
  • Shortcode Generator for both the plugins

V 1.5 – 23/11/2015

  • Shortcode [city-events] to display events on post and pages
  • Auto suggestion box for selecting city
  • Hide plugin title

V 1.0 – 21/10/2015

  • Initial release
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Unpack events-in-city.zip and upload its content to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugins called ‘All Events In City’ through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can see ‘Events In City’ and ‘Events by Organizer’ widgets in appearance -> widgets -> Events In City/Events by Organizer.
  4. Drag and drop the widget, wherever you want to display events.
  5. You can also generate shortcode to display events from “All Events in City” menu from admin sidebar.
